p: As illustrated in Fig.Â 3, maximum numbers of nonamers were found to be recognized by the allele HLA DRB1_0308, which bound to nine of the conserved region peptides. DRB1_0101 bound to eight and DRB1_1321 bound to seven, DRB1_0102, 0401, 0426, 1101, 1107 and 1120 bound to six conserved region peptides respectively.
